pr_title: [DOCS] Updating password usage for create user API

timeline.bodyText:
In some other APIs where a parameter is required in some but not all situations, we've added an asterisk like this:

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            (Required, string) The user's password. Passwords must be at least 6 characters long.
          
          
            
            (Required*, string) The user's password. Passwords must be at least 6 characters long.
          
      
    
    
  

E.g. https://www.elastic.co/guide/en/elasticsearch/reference/7.9/analysis-dict-decomp-tokenfilter.html
